Package au.csiro.pathling.library.io

Class FileSystemPersistence

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.library.io.FileSystemPersistence
public class FileSystemPersistence extends Object
Utility methods relating to persisting data to the filesystem.
Author:
John Grimes

    • getFileSystem

      @Nonnull public static org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem getFileSystem(@Nonnull SparkSession spark, @Nonnull String location)
      Get a Hadoop FileSystem for the given location.
      Parameters:
      spark - the Spark session
      location - the location URL to be accessed
      Returns:
      the FileSystem for the given location
      Throws:
      PersistenceError - if there is a problem accessing the location
      IllegalArgumentException - if the location URL is malformed

    • departitionResult

      @Nonnull public static String departitionResult(@Nonnull SparkSession spark, @Nonnull String partitionedLocation, @Nonnull String departitionedLocation, @Nonnull String extension)
      Convert a directory containing a single file partition into a single file.
      Parameters:
      spark - the Spark session
      partitionedLocation - the location URL containing the partitioned file
      departitionedLocation - the desired URL of the resulting file
      extension - the file extension used within the partitioned directory
      Returns:
      the location of the resulting file

    • departitionResult

      @Nonnull public static String departitionResult(@Nonnull org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem partitionedLocation, @Nonnull String partitionedUrl, @Nonnull String departitionedUrl, @Nonnull String extension)
      Convert a directory containing a single file partition into a single file.
      Parameters:
      partitionedLocation - a Hadoop FileSystem representing the location that both the partitioned and departitioned files are located in
      partitionedUrl - the URL of the partitioned file
      departitionedUrl - the desired URL of the resulting file
      extension - the file extension used within the partitioned directory
      Returns:
      the location of the resulting file
      Throws:
      PersistenceError - if there is a problem copying the partition file
